Active sessions can continue + * to be used so long as resume and rejoin operations are not attempted. @@ -118,2 +119,3 @@ - * SSLSession object is invalidated and future connections - * cannot resume or rejoin the session. + * SSLSession object is marked so that future connections + * cannot resume or rejoin the session. Active sessions can continue + * to be used so long as resume and rejoin operations are not attempted.
